Teun van den Brand is a consultant based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.
He currently works on open source tools for data visualisation, specifically [ggplot2](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/) in the [R](https://cran.r-project.org/) language for [Posit, PBC](https://posit.co/).
